The Red Moon in my world is associated with fire and power. Because so many Red Moon Stones fall on the lands of Nasr, they've become a desert where plant life cannot grow.
The Green Moon in my world is associated with growth and healing. Because it shines strongly over Ixa'taka, that country is covered in lush jungles and forests teeming with life.
The Blue Moon in my world is associated with wind and water. The people of Yafutoma use its power to build ships that can fly far higher or lower in the sky than those of other nations.

The Purple Moon in my world is associated with ice and the mind. It shines over the Lands of Ice, which are uninhabited by humans today. (Uninhabited by humans... that definitely doesn't describe anything related to the Moon in this game...)
The Yellow Moon in my world is associated with electricity. It creates great thunderclouds over the nation of Valua, which provide abundant power, but also perpetually cover the land in darkness.

In addition to the six ordinary Moons in my world, it's possible a Black Moon exists. There's a Moon Stone in the Dark Rift that might have come from a hypothetical Black Moon... but if it's real, nothing is known about it.

Rather than use their powerful magic and technology to aid the poor and needy, the ancient civilizations of my world created terrible living weapons called the Gigas, and set them against each other in battle. It was the Gigas that brought an end to the Old World... so many people died as a result.

Our world has six Moons, each of a different color... Green, Red, Blue, Purple, Yellow, and Silver. Each has a different power channeled through the Moon Stones that fall from the sky. Moon Stones are used in many types of advanced technology, such as airships, and can also be used to perform magic. For that reason, many of us have great reverence for the Moons.

Recumen, the Red Gigas, was the first Gigas we encountered. He nearly destroyed Drachma's ship, the Little Jack, with his heat rays. We were unable to destroy him, but managed to deactivate him and recover the Red Moon Crystal that controls him.

We encountered Grendel, the Green Gigas, in Ixa'taka. The king there attempted to use his power to drive away the invading Valuans, but soon lost control of him and he turned his mighty fists on everything in sight. Fortunately, we were able to subdue him until the Green Moon Crystal could be recovered.

We fought Bluheim, the Blue Gigas, in the land of Yafutoma during a battle with the Valuan Armada. Most of the ships were blown away by his Blue Winds, but Prince Enrique's flagship, the Delphinus, gave us enough power to destroy him.

Yeligar, the Yellow Gigas, had been sealed away in the ancient caverns beneath Valua. We were unable to take his Yellow Moon Crystal from him without waking him, and were forced to face his lightning in order to destroy him in the Delphinus.

Plergoth was the Purple Gigas, whom the Purple Civilization of old created by implanting the Purple Moon Crystal in an unfortunate arcwhale. Well... in the end, he passed away, and we obtained the Purple Moon Crystal... but I think I won't dwell on it further.

The world of Arcadia, as my people called it, is a world of floating islands in an endless sky. Humans and other creatures inhabit the islands and must use airships to travel from one to the next. I'm not certain what causes the islands to float, but I believe it is the power of the Moon Stones that commonly fall and become embedded in them, as those stones are commonly used to make ships fly as well.

Silver Magic is my specialty. The Silver Moon governs life, death and void, and its magic is useful for reviving those who fall in battle as well as snuffing out a foe's life in an instant. Um, but it has some more mundane applications as well, which are especially useful for sexually active women... if any of you find that helpful in the future, I'd be happy to cast some for you.

Let's see... I use the same names for them as everyone else I've met, but I often use Silver spells, like Curia, Riselem and Eternum... and healing magic such as Sacrum and Sacrulen.
Um... I actually don't know, since I'm not entirely sure what "Christmas" is. I'm guessing it's some sort of event during Silver December...

case.state: Er... you're going to help ~player~ win, Chara? According to your... arrangement, won't you both win regardless of what happens now...?

state.text: Are you all right, Nami? It was obvious that Perona coerced you into saying that, I certainly wouldn't hold you to it.
Oh, I certainly hope not, Nagisa... I thought this was going to be a private game. (That could be exciting, maybe, but I'd want to know it was a possibility ahead of time...)
Well, that hasn't generally happened in past games I've played here, Nagisa... I think the idea is for us to have a private space, at least, if we want it to be private...
(Well, I'm glad Jim didn't bump... anything like that... on the doorway... Wait, why am I being indirect about it in my own thoughts? I could just think that I'm glad Jim's penis wasn't harmed...)
Oh... is it against the rules here to drink alcohol under that age? I've had plenty of the strong kind of loqua in the past, but I'm only eighteen... so, I certainly hope it's all right...
Er... (Okay, that one wasn't even bad in a funny way...)
Um... (Even I don't have low enough standards for that one to make me laugh...)
Well, I don't... need much incentive to continue playing this game, to be honest, but... a good, hearty meal is very helpful to me, if there's an important battle ahead...

case.state: Oh, I don't know whether he's what you would call a "robot" exactly, but my Cupil is a... created lifeform, at least. {Cupil}[Chirp, chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Oh, Cupil can play some pleasant tunes, if you'd like. He can even change the music depending on whether you're winning or losing... I find that very exciting.
Oh? Komi, you only need to take off one thing at a time, it's all right to take it slow...
My dream? I think Vyse's wanderlust has rubbed off on me... I really want to visit new places, meet new people, have new... experiences. That's why I'm at the Inventory...

Well, let's see... Vyse, Aika and I were thinking of paying Gordo's Bistro a visit. His food is some of the best I've tasted, and he's been very friendly since he became a famous chef and gave up pirating.

Well, let's see... I've heard that the Black Pirate Baltor has been prowling around Crescent Isle again. Vyse wants to go out for a sail, so I imagine we'll end up defeating him tomorrow, which might be fun.
Well, let's see... it's been a while since we visited Esperanza. Vyse, Aika and I might start sailing over there tomorrow to visit Don and see if he's made any progress charting the Dark Rift...

Well, let's see... Kirala wanted us to pick up some more materials for the new harbor she's building on Crescent Isle. We'll probably sail out to get those, and do a little sightseeing along the way...
Oh, I see... you really had me fooled, Saki, I would never have guessed you were a zombie. (Not if you hadn't told us all earlier, anyway...)

Luffy sounds like an interesting person... our captain is Vyse, and he's not stupid, but he can be a little silly... in tense situations, I might have to tell him something multiple times before he notices.

Interesting... Zoro's fighting style sounds a little like our captain Vyse's. Vyse only uses two swords, though... I'm surprised using three swords at once is even possible, but I suppose I've seen stranger things.
Usopp is a sniper? I don't think we really have one of those. Tikatika was skilled with his bow at long distances, but he didn't fight except in emergencies, and now he's gone back to Ixa'taka...
A good cook makes things much nicer... I really miss Urala's cooking. Her Yafutoman cuisine was delicious, especially the dumplings she used to make. But, now she's settled down in Valua...

Chopper's a reindeer?! I don't think we've ever had an animal join our crew. Well... no, that's not true, we have Pow. But he's just an ordinary Huskra, he certainly can't talk or turn into a human...
Oh, I didn't realize there were so few women in your crew, Nami! Ours was always about half women... but, Aika is the only one who's stuck with me and Vyse all the way. She means the world to me...

I'm glad you have a talented shipwright, Nami. Our old engineer Brabham worked miracles on the Delphinus, but he runs the Valuan shipyards now. Though, he might still be upgrading the Delphinus over there...
A living skeleton?! I don't think we've ever had someone as... unusual... as Brook in our crew. But, I guess that would only add to the entertainment value in a way...
Oh my... um, is that so, ~player~? Well... I don't really think I know you well enough yet, but... um, I suppose I wouldn't rule it out for the future...

In my world, I think it has to be the creation of the Gigas, the ancient living weapons that ultimately led to the Rains of Destruction, wiping away the old world. It was terrible, but very impactful.
Oh my... um, is that so, ~player~? I... don't think that's going to be possible, but I'm flattered anyway...
Oh my... um, is that so, ~player~? Well... I don't really think I know you well enough to consent to that sort of sleepover... but, it's an interesting idea...
Another... universe? Well, I think I'm in one now... as this appears to be a place where people from many realities can gather. But, I don't know how to perform such travel without an invitation...
Well, I'm already a member of a pirate crew of my own... but perhaps we'd be able to collaborate with your "Magno Family"? I can ask Vyse... as our captain, it'd be his decision.
Since these games are free, I doubt they make any money here... but, I suspect the usual rules don't apply to a place like this. We never needed money in the Great Silver Shrine, after all...

It's a little strange, Fluttershy, but strip poker is the only type of poker I play... I've been playing it since ~player~ invited me here, and I really enjoy it. Perhaps I should try ordinary poker, too...

It's very kind of you to offer some advice, Senko... I understand the, um, basic mechanics of... intimacy, but the social aspect is very confusing. It's so private that I've never seen a good example of, well... asking.

case.state: No, you didn't, Ignatz, I... my imagination is a little too active, I think, under these circumstances... I'll agree to be painted clothed, and... I won't make any other decisions yet.

state.text: Thank you, Ignatz... I haven't had many people offer to paint me before, so... the honor is really mine.

I see... so I should just be direct about it, and we can establish what we each want? I'm... not entirely sure what I do want, but I certainly know what feels nice... I suppose we could experiment together...
Oh, that one was quite amusing, Lux...
I really shouldn't have found that joke as funny as I did...
You're doing a good job of, um, lightening the mood, Lux!
I like your sense of humor, Lux.
That one was ridiculous, Lux, I loved it.
You're a silly person, Lux.
I didn't realize you were so, er, light-hearted, Lux.
Lux, you have a really, um, sunny personality.
Oh! That looked uncomfortable, Lyralei... do I need to cast Sacres?
No, Fluttershy, this is my very first time playing any sort of poker... but I've found that I learn best by just jumping in and figuring things out as I go, so...

It's a little strange, Fluttershy, but strip poker is the only type of poker I really play... I only got into it after ~player~ invited me here a little while ago, but now I'm playing whenever I have the chance.
Oh, that's a relief! Thank the Moons you finally found them, Ignatz.
Oh my, someone else is joining you, Charlie?

case.state: It's a pleasure to meet you, Fat Nuggets! Thank you so much for joining us...
It's a pleasure to meet you, Fat Nuggets! Why don't you say hi too, Cupil? {Cupil}[Chirp!]{!reset}

state.text: Hmm, I'm not sure what qualifies as "pampering", but I came here primarily to learn. In this context, maybe discussing sexual intimacy could qualify? But, you really don't need to pamper me...
I've never thought much about it, Penny, but... the feeling of food in my stomach is quite a nice one, especially if I was very hungry before.
My favorite view is the open sky from aboard our ship... not only is it beautiful, but it takes me back to some of the most... treasured memories of my life. I doubt I'll ever get tired of it...
Well... I wasn't in love with him, I don't think. But, I never expected that Ramirez would do such... terrible things... we were children together, and... I thought he was a good person.
Wait... Hilda, you were playing badly on purpose? Wouldn't that just make it more difficult for you to win the game?
Hilda, you were playing badly on purpose? But... doesn't that just put you at a disadvantage?
Oh, that sounds quite nice, actually, Ignatz... I'd be quite grateful if you wanted to paint me.

case.state: Oh, my... um, Ignatz, do you mean paint me like... this? I'm... that would really be something. I'll think about it...
Oh, Moons... to be painted in this condition would be... if you can do it before I'm... concluded, Ignatz...

state.text: ...It's the same with me, Nagisa. I'm... actually not sure if I really have a mother or father, either? The Silvite Elders must have created me somehow, but... I'm not sure what they did...
Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose we met a bird in Yafutoma who kept repeating "Looks tasty!" after Vyse said that, but I have a feeling you meant something else...
Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose we met a bird in Yafutoma who kept repeating "Kind of cute!" after Vyse said that, but I have a feeling you meant something else...
Um... they do Fluttershy? Well, I suppose we met a bird in Yafutoma who kept repeating "Go away! Shoo! Shoo!" after Vyse said that, but I have a feeling you meant something else...
Um... they do, Fluttershy? Well, I suppose our friend Gilder has a parrot who can talk, though it's mostly repeating short phrases, but I have a feeling you meant something else...

case.state: Well, Cupil is sort of like a pet... perhaps you'll meet him later on? And we also have a Huskra who lives on our ship, named Pow... he's very devoted to Vyse, and so friendly.
Well, Cupil is sort of like a pet, I suppose... and we also have a Huskra who lives on our ship, named Pow... he's very devoted to Vyse, and so friendly.

state.text: Well, hopefully for the same reason the rest of you did... I wanted to experience all of this game's... possibilities. And perhaps learn a bit more about intimacy in the process...

case.state: This is why, Fluttershy, so I could experience... this... Moons, it feels so wonderful...

state.text: You... want to be an assassin, Ignatz? Um... I'm a little surprised that's a career you're interested in... but good luck on the certifications, I suppose?

Deep Sky might be the most dangerous. Without a specially reinforced hull, your ship would be crushed by the pressure there---not to mention the ship-sized monsters lurking in the mud at the very bottom.

If it counts, Nami, I like the tattoos on my shoulders and forehead. I... don't fully understand their significance, but they remind me that I'm a Silvite, and despite everything, I guess I'm still proud of that...
Unfortunately, Meia, I don't have much more insight into that than you do... I'm certainly used to being around men by this point, but... I haven't figured out how "dating" works yet, either.

... You were naked for that entire time? Oh my, I... I've never been naked for more than half an hour or so... even less in the Great Silver Shrine, since bathing was so efficient. But... I wonder what it would be like...
Well, I'm actually here from Arcadia, not Earth... (or at least that's what the Silvites called it...) so, I'm really sorry, but I won't be able to help you much with that.

I think my greatest fear is... being alone again. I was so lonely almost all my life, up in the Great Silver Shrine with no one but me and the Elders, and Ramirez before he left... I don't ever want to live that way again.
That's your Devil Fruit ability? Drawing power from special fruit reminds me of Moonberries... wait, are you threatening the rest of us? You shouldn't attack other players!
...Unfortunately, this question isn't a hypothetical one for me. Yes, I would... even if that person had been very dear to me...
For me, I think the cutest thing was visiting Hamachou Island. One of the little Hamachou birds there looked just like Vyse, and it was so adorable! I think Vyse was a little embarrassed, though.

...I don't think they could be, Takatoshi... if I hadn't been so fortunate to meet Vyse and Aika when I did... I'm not sure how I would have turned out in the end. Or if I'd been raised the way Ramirez was... I think about that a lot.
Hmm, I'd say a ideal mercenary should be a caring person who will only accept jobs that improve people's lives. I couldn't respect someone who would do anything for money, even hurt the innocent...
The Blade Breaker... Two? Does that mean there was another Blade Breaker earlier? I'm not sure I fully understand the context here...
"The Raging Bear"? That sounds... hmm... passionate and intimidating, but also like someone who fights to protect others. I think I like it...
The... Executioner? That doesn't sound like the sort of mercenary I'd want to have anything to do with... it doesn't even sound like a mercenary so much as some... minion of an oppressive state...

It's a little disconcerting to think you can just read our hearts, Miko, but... I just want to live a full life. I want to travel far with my friends Vyse and Aika, and to see and experience as much as I can...

Yes, based on my own experiences, I have to agree with you, Nami. I've gotten pretty good at taking care of myself by now, but I'd still rather travel with Vyse and Aika... the three of us can handle any danger.
Ignatz, surely your goddess wouldn't call down wrath on you just because of something harmless like this...? If she cares about you the way you seem to believe, I can't imagine she'd be that cruel...
Oh no... um... what can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? I could show my breasts for a second, if that would help...

case.state: Oh no... um... what can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? I could pull down my leggings a bit for a second, if that would help...
Oh no... um... what can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? I could, er, play with myself for a second, if that would help...
Oh no... um... what can I do to help you get viewers, Streaming-chan? Is there a way you want me to pose or something to be more exciting?

state.text: ...I haven't felt that way about someone before, Ayano, but I've known others who have, and... it hasn't ended well. There should never be anyone you're willing to do anything for...
Zelos?! (The Silver Gigas, Zelos? Wait, no, that can't possibly be who Sheena means... it must be a different Zelos.)
Oh... maybe I'd like to be able to talk to Loopers, and tell them to leave us alone? Or any dangerous creature that attacks our ship, I always feel bad that we have to hurt them to defend ourselves.
That's certainly part of why I'm here, Penny. I've... really come to appreciate the value of good friends...
Congratulations, Nagisa, you were very brave... I liked your play, too.
Oh, I don't see a scar anywhere, Nagisa... perhaps your father was just teasing you?
I enjoyed it a great deal, Hilda... I... wasn't really compiling proper feedback at the time, but I thought it was beautiful.

case.state: It was beautiful, Hilda, it really helped me a lot... thank you so much...

state.text: Well, I certainly don't see anything wrong with it. Pleasuring oneself doesn't harm anyone, and it's, well... pleasurable, and a good way to pass the time, I've always felt...
Chara... your eyes! What under the six Moons...?
(Her eyes have gone all black again... what is she??)
(I don't think I'm ever going to get used to that... what sort of being is Chara, anyway?)
(Chara's face is sending chills down my spine...)
(...What sort of creature is Chara, anyway? ~Player~, what have you done...?)
~Player~, why... why do Chara's eyes look like that? Do you know what's going on...?
(...I've faced many terrifying things in the past, but Chara is like nothing I've ever encountered before...)
(Moons... who is Chara? What is she doing here? And why did ~player~ invite her...?)
(Chara's eyes... it's like staring into the Dark Rift... could she somehow be connected to the Black Moon...?)
